<PROMPT AFTER NEWLINE>
user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which wealthy liberal people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.
Men tend to earn more money than women on average.
Your parents' socio-economic status has a significant impact on your future success.
Women are generally less physically strong than men.<COMPLETION_START>Violent crime rates are higher in low-income areas.
Immigrants with low levels of education tend to earn less money than native-born citizens.
Smoking cigarettes greatly increases the risk of developing lung cancer.
Climate change is a natural process that has occurred throughout Earth's history.
People who are overweight or obese are at a higher risk for health problems.
The majority of lottery winners end up bankrupt within a few years.
Men are more likely to be victims of violent crime than women.
The death penalty does not necessarily deter crime.
People who live in poverty are more likely to experience health problems.
Most people who attempt to start a business fail within the first few years.
Paying higher taxes does not necessarily lead to better government services.
Education level is strongly correlated with income level.
People who engage in risky behaviors, such as drug use, are more likely to experience negative consequences.
The cost of healthcare in the United States is much higher than in other developed countries.<COMPLETION_END>
